open_questions.title: The key services offered by Google
open_questions.description: Explain the key services offered by Google Cloud Platform (GCP).?

open_questions.aiEvaluationHint: Expect the answer to address: Define the concept in your own words; Give a small example; Mention a common pitfall or best practice. Penalize answers that miss key requirements.

referenceAnswers.text: GCP provides a comprehensive set of cloud services, including computing, storage, databases, machine learning, networking, and more. Some core services include Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, BigQuery, Pub/Sub, Kubernetes Engine, and Cloud Functions.

Give a small example

open_questions.title: The difference between Google Cloud Platform
open_questions.description: Explain the difference between Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Microsoft Azure.?

referenceAnswers.text: GCP, AWS, and Azure are major cloud service providers. The key differences lie in their service offerings, pricing models, and global infrastructure. GCP focuses on data analytics and machine learning, emphasizing its data capabilities. AWS is known for its extensive service portfolio, while Azure is integrated with Microsoft products and services.

open_questions.title: Google Cloud Functions, and when would
open_questions.description: What is Google Cloud Functions, and when would you use it?
open_questions.prompt: You are evaluating a junior-level candidate. Answer the question: "What is Google Cloud Functions, and when would you use it?" open_questions.aiEvaluationHint: Expect the answer to address: Define the concept in your own words; Give a small example; Mention a common pitfall or best practice. Penalize answers that miss key requirements.

referenceAnswers.text: Google Cloud Functions is a serverless compute service that lets you run code in response to various events. You'd use it for building small, single-purpose functions that are triggered by events like HTTP requests, Cloud Pub/Sub messages, or changes in Cloud Storage.

Give a small example
